files.patch:
@@ -380,0 +380,7 @@
+  # Eclipse does have rudimentary support for these, so why not?
+  # Their inclusion will not affect or slow indexing down in any way regardless
+  $$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, make,$(TOPDIR)/.github)
+  $$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, make,$(TOPDIR)/.jcheck)
+  $$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, make,$(TOPDIR)/bin)
+  $$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, make,$(TOPDIR)/doc)
+
